document_data.mainbody:
lack raptor staff was an enchanted druidic staff found in the jungles of Chult in the late 15 century DR.
Black raptor staves were carved out of dark and solid suth wood and decorated with gemstones and raptor talons. The staves possessed a potent +3 enchantment and strengthened the druid abilities of the wielder as well as the druids allies.
* Qawasha, a druid of the Emerald Enclave from Chult in the late 15 century DR.
